eh, i hate red tape too
it wasn't the hinting, was the antialiasing
and like most things since gnome2 was killed off, it is annoyingly convoluted :)

once I did that (and I wasn't sure of pixel order, I just kept changing them until it stopped looking muddy)
wow, convoluted was the right word
but. yeah. annoying. that used to be a nice friendly menu in config settings :(
